alert.note: Alert for Cocke Smoky Mountains; Northwest Cocke; Southeast Greene (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:34PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cocke County through 830 PM EDT... At 734 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Parrottsville, or 11 miles east of Newport, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parrottsville and Del Rio. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cocke Smoky Mountains; Northwest Cocke; Southeast Greene
